info.description: API to create, update and manage transfer agent fund detail information
info.title: Transfer agent fund information

get.summary: Retrieves the list of transfer agent fund informations
get.description: Retrieves the list of transfer agent fund informations

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: Total number of records per page (Default:25)

parameters.name: orders
parameters.description: An 'orders' parameter allows you to specify the order in which rows appear in the result set Eg: orders=fundname:0,masterfund:1 where 'fundname' is field, '0' for ascending manner and ',' as seperator for fields

parameters.name: groups
parameters.description: A 'groups' parameter is used to collect data across multiple records and group the results by one or more columns. Eg: groups=nationality,reclaimtax-nationality:EQ:Indian,reclaimtax:EQ:N-nationality:COUNT where 'nationality,reclaimtax' is for the fields and 'nationality:EQ:Indian,reclaimtax:EQ:N-nationality' are filters, 'nationality:COUNT' is a aggregator and '-' as seperator

parameters.name: filters
parameters.description: Use a 'filters' parameter to select rows based on a value by using basic operators like EQ, NE etc.., Eg: filters=statistictype:NE:SRS where 'statistictype' is a field, 'NE' is a operator and 'SRS' is a value

parameters.name: command
parameters.description: API operations like INVOKE, VALIDATE, PROCESS can be set or by default PROCESS is set

post.summary: Creates a transfer agent fund information record
post.description: Creates a transfer agent fund information record

parameters.name: command
parameters.description: API operations like INVOKE, VALIDATE, PROCESS can be set or by default PROCESS is set

put.summary: Updates transfer agent fund information records with identifiers specified in the payload
put.description: Updates transfer agent fund information records with identifiers specified in the payload

parameters.name: command
parameters.description: API operations like INVOKE, VALIDATE, PROCESS can be set or by default PROCESS is set

delete.summary: Deletes transfer agent fund information records with identifiers provided in the payload
delete.description: Deletes transfer agent fund information records with identifiers provided in the payload

parameters.name: command
parameters.description: API operations like INVOKE, VALIDATE, PROCESS can be set or by default PROCESS is set

get.summary: Retrieves a specific transfer agent fund information record
get.description: Retrieves a specific transfer agent fund information record

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: Total number of records per page (Default:25)

parameters.name: orders
parameters.description: An 'orders' parameter allows you to specify the order in which rows appear in the result set Eg: orders=fundname:0,masterfund:1 where 'fundname' is field, '0' for ascending manner and ',' as seperator for fields

parameters.name: groups
parameters.description: A 'groups' parameter is used to collect data across multiple records and group the results by one or more columns. Eg: groups=nationality,reclaimtax-nationality:EQ:Indian,reclaimtax:EQ:N-nationality:COUNT where 'nationality,reclaimtax' is for the fields and 'nationality:EQ:Indian,reclaimtax:EQ:N-nationality' are filters, 'nationality:COUNT' is a aggregator and '-' as seperator

parameters.name: filters
parameters.description: Use a 'filters' parameter to select rows based on a value by using basic operators like EQ, NE etc.., Eg: filters=statistictype:NE:SRS where 'statistictype' is a field, 'NE' is a operator and 'SRS' is a value

parameters.name: command
parameters.description: API operations like INVOKE, VALIDATE, PROCESS can be set or by default PROCESS is set

delete.description: Deletes a transfer agent fund information record

parameters.name: command
parameters.description: API operations like INVOKE, VALIDATE, PROCESS can be set or by default PROCESS is set

reference.description: Contains external and internal identifiers of the record

entityType.description: Identifies the entity. For e.g. 0001 for registers, 0002 for agents, 0007 for investors, etc.

internalId.description: Internal identifier of the records.  Generated by the system during POST and can be used for other operations

promoterInternalId.description: Internal identifier of the Fund promoter linked to the entity

promoterExternalId.description: External identifier of the Fund promoter linked to the entity

parent.description: Contains external and internal identifiers of the parent record, if the current record belongs to sub entities

parentEntityType.description: Identifies the parent entity. For e.g. 0001 for registers, 0002 for agents, 0007 for investors, etc.

parentInternalId.description: Internal identifier of the parent record

parentExternalId.description: External identifier of the parent record

parentPromoterInternalId.description: Internal identifier of the Fund promoter linked to the parent entity

parentPromoterExternalId.description: External identifier of the Fund promoter linked to the parent entity

tafund.description: Contains individual attributes of the TAFUND entity

entityStatus.description: Fund status code. For example: 1(Active), 2(Inactive), 3(Deleted) etc. The LoV is available in the CMESS table TYPE_USE.

fundType.description: The type of fund code. Allowed values are from the list of fund type codes available in MFGI.

masterFundId.description: Master Fund External ID linked to the TA Fund

commissionGroup.description: Fund commission group code linked to the TA Fund . The LoV is available in the CMESS table TA_CGROUP.

sharePriceDecimals.description: The number of decimals used in the Share Price definition - up to 6 decimals. Possible Values: 0 (Integer), 1(1 Decimal- places), 2 (2 Decimal places) etc.  The LoV is available in the CMESS table CODE_ARR.

quotationCurrency.description: Quotation currency (in 3 letter format eg- USD) of the TA fund. The LoV is available in the CMESS table MONNAIES.

subscriptionPrice.description: The Initial subscription price in fund quotation currency. This price will be applicable during the initial subscription period only (Fields: First Subscription Date - Last subscription Date)This price is applicable on subscription transaction only (operation code = 0001).

quantityDecimals.description: Number of decimal places in the client share quantity calculation. Possible Values: 0 (Integer), 1(1 Decimal- places), 2 (2 Decimal places) etc. The LoV is available in the CMESS table CODE_ARR.

quantityRoundingType.description: Quantity Rounding type code at register level. This will override the parameters defined at fund level. Possible Values: 0001(Commercial rounding),0002(Round credits down, debits up), 0003 (Rounding down) etc. The LoV is available in the CMESS table TA_ARRONDI.

commissionCode.description: The code to define commission calculation. Allowe values: N(Calculate on Net amount), A(Calculate on NAV), B(Calculate on Gross amount). The LoV is available in the CMESS table TA_FUN_COM.

tfcExternalId.description: TFC external ID linked to the TA fund

tfcId.description: The TFC ID linked to the TA fund

firstSubscriptionDate.description: The first subscription date of initial subscription period.

lastSubscriptionDate.description: The fund last subscription date of the initial subscription period. Between the first and last subscription date, the price entered in the subscription price field will be applied to subscriptions.

agentId.description: Agent Internal ID linked to the TA Fund. The LoV is available in the CMESS table TA_OGROUP.

agentExternalId.description: Agent External ID linked to the TA Fund

valueDateType.description: Value date type code. Allowed values: F(Fix), M(Min). For the value date method 1- Postpone Fund Country Holiday, the user has to select either F for Fix or M for Min. The Fix allows the user to define a fixed number of days to be taken into account and the Min allows the user to take into consideration the smallest number of days between agent and fund set-up. The LoV is available in the CMESS table TA_TVDATE.

numberOfDays.description: It specifies the number of days between trade date and value date for the fund.

trailerFeeGroup.description: Trailer fee group code linked to the TA Fund. Allowed values are from the list of group codes defined in MFGI.

fundCategory.description: The fund category code. Allowed values are from the list of category codes available in MFGI table GLCAT.

riskClassCode.description: The fund risk class to manage investment restrictions. Allowed values are from list of risk class codes defined in MFGI.

securityCategory.description: Security category code. Allowed values: 0001 (Share fund) ,0002 (bond fund), 0003(Share and Bond fund). The LoV is available in the CMESS table TA_SECTYPE.

commissionDisclosureCode.description: It specifies if the split of commissions between the Management company and agents may or may not have to be disclosed on contract notes. Allowed values: 00(Outlet preference). 01(No commission disclosure),02(commission disclosure). The LoV is available in the CMESS table TA_COMDIS.

noAmountFlag.description: Flag allows to block placing any transaction in amount for the related operation code. Allowed values:Y(to block), N(to unblock).

contractNotesModel.description: The model code of contract note sent by the TA. For example: 0001(No contact note), 0002(Cn Model1) etc. The field is linked to  the Cash and Security management functionality. The LoV is available in the CMESS table TA_MODEL.

valueDateMethod.description: Value date method code to manage the settlement date based on the holidays to consider. For example: 0001 (Method1-Postpone Fund Country holiday), 0002 (Method2- Postpone Quotation/Payment currency holiday), 0003(Skip  Quotation/Payment currency holiday) etc.. The LoV is available in the CMESS table TA_FDELAY.

significantFigures.description: The number of digits of the share price instead of a number of decimals. 0 on the left of the first digit greater or equal to 1 are not considered as significant figures. For example: 2(2 significant figures), 3(3 significant figures) etc. The LoV is available in the CMESS table TA_CD_ARRS.

minimumSubscriptionAmount.description: The minimum subscription amount in quotation currency.

equalizationCode.description: Equalization code linked to the Fund. Allowed values: 0001(RNI part), 0002(Interim profit/ german tax part), 0003(Gain cap part). The LoV is available in the CMESS table TA_CODEEGA.

stableNav.description: The Stable NAV price. The field is used only if the fund type is 0006 - Money Market - Stable NAV Fund.

roundingFromSwitch.description: The rounding rules code defined for the switch-out fund.Indicates the counterpart (Fund, register, lower-agent, tfc, etc,) to which the residual amount resulting from a switch transaction (in switch-in contract) has to be paid. On . For example: 0001 (In favour of Fund), 0002(In favour of register), 0003((In favour of register direct)etc. The LoV is available in the CMESS table TA_RSWITCH.

dailyDivCalculationType.description: To define if Daily Dividend will be calculated as of Trade Date, as of Previous Trade Date or as of Value Date.This field is mandatory if Fund Type is 0006 - Money Market - Stable NAV Fund. The LoV is available in the CMESS table TA_RPOSCLC.

accountingProvider.description: The Account Manager of the TA fund. Allowed values are from the list of account provider Ids in MFGI.

regulator.description: Regulator name. This field is for Information purpose.

firstSubscriptionFlag.description: Flag allows to enables first subscription functionality for the fund. The first transaction placed by each register in the fund should be done under the operation code 0068 - First subscription instead of a normal Subscription. This allows setting up a specific commission and specific transaction limits for the first subscription placed in the fund. Allowed values: Y(to enable), N(to disable).

openingDate.description: TA fund first authorized business date

closingDate.description: The TA fund last business date before set to inactive

delayDays.description: Delay days to be taken into account when calculating the revised trade date

managementCompanyFlag.description: Flag allows to report the commission amount due to the agent defined through agent number field is considered as the management fee and is not included in the amount reported on the cash flow forecast. Allowed values: Y(for Yes), N(for No).

maximumCommissionFlag.description: Flag allows defining the method applied on manager charges for the selected fund. Allowed values: Y(for Yes), N(for No). If maximumCommissionFlag is set as Y, then Total commissionFlagcannot be set as Y.This flag is only active in case the field Agent ID is filled in and the Management company flag is set as Y.

totalCommissionFlag.description: Flag allows defining the method applied on manager charges for the selected fund. Allowed values: Y (for yes), N(for No). If totalCommissionFlag is set  as Y then Max. comm. flag cannot be set. This flag is active only in case the field Agent ID is filled in and the Management company flag is ticked.

noReinvestmentFlag.description: Flag allows to block automatic reinvestment order created by the system after the batch process or after the payment process if the register is blocked through AML module (any AML blocking code). Allowed values:Y(to block), N(to unblock).

valueDateRecalculationOnPaymentFlag.description: Flag enables to recalculate the value date based on the forced trade date entered at payment level. Allowed values: Y (for Yes), N(for No).

onlyRedemptionFlag.description: Flag enables to allow only a defined set of transactions to be placed for the fund. The flag shall be used when no new subscriptions are allowed. Allowed values: Y(for Yes), N(for No).

externalTaId.description: Internal ID of  Central Register created with Type as CT  linked to the TFC.

externalTaExternalId.description: External ID of  Central Register created with Type as CT  linked to the TFC.

dailyDividendPaymentMethod.description: Daily Dividend accruals payment frequency code. This field is updateable only when Fund Type is 0006 - Money Market - Stable NAV Fund. Allowed values: 0001(End of the Month), 0002(Interim dividend). The LoV is available in the CMESS table TA_DIVPAY.

cutOffGroup.description: Cutoff group code linked to the TA fund for the cut off definition by group of agent and by group of fund. Allowed values are from the list of group Ids in MFGI table CUTOFF_FND.

cashAccountManagementFlag.description: Flag allows to authorise the register for the cash account functionality. Allowed values: Y(for Yes) or N(for No).

boxManagementCode.description: It specifies if the fund supports the Box Management. Allowed values: 0001 (Yes), 0002(No). The field is  mandatory only when Box Management has been activated at the Application Manager level. The LoV is available in the CMESS table RE_BOXMGR.

dealType.description: Deal type code for Cash handling at TA Fund level. For example: 0001(Contractual), 0002(Semi-Contractual), 0003(Actual) etc. The LoV is available in the CMESS table TA_DEAL.

dividendIncomeEqualisation.description: The dividend income equalisation methods. Allowed values: 0001(Average income equalization), 0002 (Individual income equalization). The LoV is available in the CMESS table UK_DV_EQLI.

fofRegisterId.description: Fund Of Fund Register Internal ID who will be  placing the transactions for the fund of funds (If the fund type is 0020 - Fund of funds).

fofRegisterExternalId.description: Fund Of Fund Register External ID who will be  placing the transactions for the fund of funds (If the fund type is 0020 - Fund of funds).

partialSettlementPercentage.description: The percentage of the transaction that will be paid immediately if the fund is in scope of partial settlement. The rest will be paid later. This field will have an impact on redemption transactions.

quotationCurrencyCalendar.description: Quotation Currency Calendar linked to the TA Fund. Allowed values are from list of codes defined at currency holiday level. The LoV is available in the CMESS table TA_EXCEPT.

ukReportingCode.description: It specifies if the fund is in scope of UK reporting regime or not. Allowed values : 0000 (Not in scope of UK reporting regime), 0001( In scope of UK reporting regime). The LoV is available in the CMESS table UK_REPORT.

thresholdAmount.description: Threshold amount for ADL and SSP calculation, whose linked TFC is in scope for partial settlement subscription

thresholdCurrency.description: Threshold currency (in 3 letter ISO format eg: USD). The LoV is available in the CMESS table MONNAIES.

priceBasis.description: It specifies if Forward or Historic Prices are used as calculation basis. This field is for information purposes only. No process is linked to this parameterization. Allowed values 01(Forward), 02(Historic). The LoV is available in the CMESS table RE_PBASIS.

dividendDistributionOption.description: It specifies if the dividend distribution will be grouped or not. Alloweed values: 0001 (Single Dividend distribution), 0002(Grouped Dividend distribution). The LoV is available in the CMESS table TA_DDOPT.

singleInvestorId.description: Single Investro ID who trade in Indonesian securities via local brokers. This field is an informative field assigned by the Indonesian regulator.

redemptionForDividendFlag.description: Flag allows to automatically redeem the holdings for dividend payout operation. Allowed values : Y (for Yes), N(for No).

cashFlowId.description: Cash Flow ID code linked to TA Fund. Allowed values are from the list of  cash flow Ids defined in cash flow definition in MFGI.

displayDebitBankDetailsFlag.description: Flag allows to enable the bank details (for debit orders) availability in order level. This setup is part of Control on debit order bank details functionality. Allowed values: Y(for Yes), N(for No).

maturityDate.description: The maturity date of the TA fund. If a credit order is placed on and after the Maturity date of the fund then a blocking message will get displayed at order level.

warningDate.description: The cut-off date to display a warning message if a credit order is placed on and after the Warning date but before the Maturity date of the fund . The warning message will be on order level and simulation level. The field Warning date is mandatory if field Maturity date is entered.

collectionAccountGroup.description: Collection Account Group code used to group deals and receipts that can be matched together. The LoV is available in the CMESS table COLACGP.

condValueDateHolidayMasterFundCountry.description: To define how to calculate the value date if there is holiday in MF country. This field is mandatory if the Value date method is Method 5-Conditional value date calculation. Allowed values 0001(postpone the value date if there is a holiday between trade date and value date). 0002(postpone the value date if it falls on a holiday), 0003(Not applicable). The LoV is available in the CMESS table TA_VALCND.

condValueDateHolidayPaymentCurrency.description: To define how to calculate the value date if there is holiday in Payment Currency. This field is mandatory if the Value date method is Method 5-Conditional value date calculation. Allowed values 0001(postpone the value date if there is a holiday between trade date and value date). 0002(postpone the value date if it falls on a holiday), 0003(Not applicable). The LoV is available in the CMESS table TA_VALCND.

condValueDateHolidayQuotationCurrency.description: To define how to calculate the value date if there is holiday in Quotation currency. This field is mandatory if the Value date method is Method 5-Conditional value date calculation. Allowed values 0001(postpone the value date if there is a holiday between trade date and value date). 0002(postpone the value date if it falls on a holiday), 0003(Not applicable). The LoV is available in the CMESS table TA_VALCND.

condValueDateHolidayReferenceCurrency.description: To define how to calculate the value date if there is holiday in Reference currency. This field is mandatory if the Value date method is Method 5-Conditional value date calculation. Allowed values 0001(postpone the value date if there is a holiday between trade date and value date). 0002(postpone the value date if it falls on a holiday), 0003(Not applicable). The LoV is available in the CMESS table TA_VALCND.

condValueDateClosedWeekends.description: Flag allows to exclude week ends in the calculation of the value date. Allowed values: Y(for Yes), N(for No).

globalOrdering.description: Flag allows to enable the global ordering functionality.  Allowed values: Y(for Yes),N(for No)

transactionBulkingNettting.description: The grouping or Netting method code of cash movements. For example: 0001(Individual orders in Fund currency), 0002(Individual orders in Payment currency), 0003(Bulked orders in Fund currency) etc. The LoV is available in the CMESS table TYPE_BN.

cashDividendRegisterId.description: Technical register Internal ID having Person type as 0900-Fund, can be specified as Cash dividend register External ID. This field is mandatory when the flag Global ordering is set Y.

cashDividendRegisterExternalId.description: Technical register External ID having Person type as 0900-Fund, can be specified as Cash dividend register External ID. This field is mandatory when the flag Global ordering is set Y.

reinvestmentRegisterId.description: Technical Register Internal ID having Person type as 0900-Fund, can be specified as Reinvestment register Internal ID. This field is mandatory when the flag Global ordering is set Y.

reinvestmentRegisterExternalId.description: Technical Register External ID having Person type as 0900-Fund, can be specified as Reinvestment register External ID. This field is mandatory when the flag Global ordering is set Y.

glFlowId.description: General Ledger Flow ID code linked to TA Fund.  Allowed values are from the list of  GL flow IDs defined in GL flow definition in MFGI.

paymentProcess.description: The payment process to be followed for the deals. Allowed values: 01(STP), 02(Semi-STP). The LoV is available in the CMESS table TA_PAYPROC.

correctivePaymentFlag.description: Flag allows to automatically create the corrective payment for the cancellation of the orders and reversal of the contracts. Allowed values: Y(for Yes), N(for No).

individualEquilizationRateReceipt.description: Individual Equilization Rate Receipt code. This field is mandatory if the Div. Inc. Equalization field is  0002(Individual Income Equalization). Allowed values: 0001(Rate recipts optional for pricing transaction) ,0002 (Rate recipts mandatory for pricing transaction).The LoV is available in the CMESS table IND_EQ_REC.

individualEquilizationMethod.description: Individual Equilization Method code. This field is mandatory if the Div. Inc. Equalization field is - 0002(Individual Income Equalization). Allowed values: 0001 (Calculation on Credit transactions with Capping), 0002 (Calculation on both Credit and Debit Transactions (FIFO) with no capping). The LoV is available in the CMESS table IND_EQ_MTH.

crossPricing.description: Flag allows to activate the cross pricing. Allowed values: Y(for Yes), N(for No).

bypassTolerance.description: Bypass tolerance code for Cross Pricing. For example: 0000(Bypass BID price should never be greater than the NAV). The LoV is available in the CMESS table TA_TOLER.

autoManual.description: Model code for cross price calculation method. Allowed values: 0000(Automatic model), 0001(Manual Model). The LoV is available in the CMESS table TA_AUTCRP.

partialPaymentFlag.description: Flag allows to enable partial payment functionality for the fund. Allowed values: Y(for Yes), N(for No).

boxValueDateMethod.description: The box Value date method code to manage the settlement date based on the holidays to consider. For example: 0001 (Method1-Postpone Fund Country holiday), 0002 (Method2- Postpone Quotation/Payment currency holiday), 0003(Skip  Quotation/Payment currency holiday) etc. The LoV is available in the CMESS table TA_FDELAY.

boxNumberOfDays.description: The number of days to be added to Trade date to arrive at the settlement date.

boxCondValueDateHolidayMasterFundCountry.description: It specifies the method  to calculate the value date if there is holiday in MF country. This field is mandatory if the Value date method is Method 5-Conditional value date calculation. Allowed values: 0001(postpone the value date if there is a holiday between trade date and value date). 0002(postpone the value date if it falls on a holiday), 0003(Not applicable). The LoV is available in the CMESS table TA_VALCND.

boxCondValueDateHolidayPaymentCurrency.description: It specifies the method to calculate the value date if there is holiday in Payment Currency. This field is mandatory if the Value date method is Method 5-Conditional value date calculation. Allowed values 0001(postpone the value date if there is a holiday between trade date and value date). 0002(postpone the value date if it falls on a holiday), 0003(Not applicable). The LoV is available in the CMESS table TA_VALCND.

boxCondValueDateHolidayQuotationCurrency.description: It specifies the method to calculate the value date if there is holiday in Quotation currency. This field is mandatory if the Value date method is Method 5-Conditional value date calculation. Allowed values 0001(postpone the value date if there is a holiday between trade date and value date). 0002(postpone the value date if it falls on a holiday), 0003(Not applicable). The LoV is available in the CMESS table TA_VALCND.

boxCondValueDateHolidayReferenceCurrency.description: It specifies the method to calculate the value date if there is holiday in Reference currency. This field is mandatory if the Value date method is Method 5-Conditional value date calculation. Allowed values 0001(postpone the value date if there is a holiday between trade date and value date). 0002(postpone the value date if it falls on a holiday), 0003(Not applicable). The LoV is available in the CMESS table TA_VALCND.

boxCondValueDateClosedWeekends.description: Flag allows to exclude week ends in the calculation of the value date. Allowed values: Y(for Yes), N(for No).

mifidStructure.description: It specifies if the fund is hedged product or a standard product . Allowed values: 0001(Non-Complex Structure), 0002(Complex Structure). The LoV is available in the CMESS table MIFID_STR.
